nodes.text: Tshindral III was a Mid Rim planetoid near the Outer Rim with a scant, toxic atmosphere which could corrode a freighter's hulls in less than a local day. It was orbited by Starlyte Station. Imperial experiments on the station had destroyed the ecosystem of the once-tropical planet below. Tshindral III had a local day 25 standard hours long and a year 300 local days long.
